data.expected_result: The app jumps to that channel when clicked.
data.short_description: Clicking on a channel in the context view for a recent mention does not jump to that channel on Testflight 1.8.0 (with iOS 9.3.5). iPad Pro.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open recent mentions - Click on a mention where a channel is mentioned somewhere in the context - Click on that channel name
